name: Stuck With You
description:
Mommy needs a carrot, a radish and a mushroom for her stew. Bicc and Smol were sent out to search and collect these ingredients. Worrying that they will lose each other, Mommy decided to chain them together. 

Help Bicc and Smol come back home with all the ingredients in Stuck With You - a cooperative puzzle adventure game (or they will starve).

Follow in-game instructions to collect the  ingredients for mommy's stew

Bicc: 

Moving - a s d w

Lay down & mash rock - left click

Smol: 

Moving - arrow keys

Jump - right click
